#Text=Get a Food Handlers Card
#Text=A food handler ’s card is required for many culinary jobs , including cook , barista , and caterer .
#Text=Though each state has slightly different requirements , the basics are the same .
#Text=To obtain your card ( also known as a certificate , license , certification , or credentials ) , you ’ll need to pass a government-approved test and pay a fee .
#Text=Then you can print your license or choose to receive a hard copy in the mail .
#Text=Once you ’ve completed the necessary steps and can present your official food handler ’s card , you can start working with food !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Taking the Course
#Text=Find the course for your state online .
#Text=You can generally find the course ( which ends with the test ) with a simple Google search .
#Text=Taking the course and test online can be more convenient because it lets you go at your own pace and gives you more flexibility .
#Text=The course and test should generally take around 1.5-2 hours .
#Text=If you ’re having trouble finding the official food handler ’s course and test for your state , you can usually find the link by searching on your state ’s . gov website .
#Text=Go to a community college if you ca n’t take an online course .
#Text=This option is helpful if you do n’t have access to a computer to take the course or you ’d prefer take it in person .
#Text=Check for local food handler ’s certification classes at colleges nearby and sign up for one .
#Text=These generally only take a day and cost the same as your certification fee .
#Text=Pay the fee to take the test and receive your card .
#Text=Whether you take your test online or in person , you ’ll need to pay a fee for the service .
#Text=Some states charge separately for taking the test and receiving your card , while others include both steps in the price .
#Text=The typical total cost ranges between $ 7 - 10.
#Text=Pay attention to the course so you can ace the test on the first try .
#Text=The test will draw questions directly from the course presentation , so it ’s important to pay attention !
#Text=Make sure to follow along and take notes if you need to .
#Text=You may be able to take the test again , but if you pay attention to the course , you should n’t need to .
#Text=Re-taking availability depends on the location .
#Text=Some courses will come with 2 test attempts , which you can use immediately .
#Text=If you fail both of those , you ’ll need to pay to take the course and test again .
#Text=Check your course details to see how many attempts are allowed in your location .
#Text=Passing the Test
#Text=Complete the test and get your results .
#Text=The questions have multiple choice answers for you to pick from .
#Text=Use the information from the presentation to choose the correct answers .
#Text=At the end of the test , you will immediately find out whether or not you passed .
#Text=Different states will have different scoring requirements .
#Text=Print or request a physical copy of your certification .
#Text=If you take the test online , you can print off a copy of your card right away .
#Text=If you take the test at a local community college , you can request a physical copy .
#Text=Take the test again if you move to a different state .
#Text=Food handler ’s cards are non-transferable between states , so you ’ll have to take a new test if you move .
#Text=However , if have a certification from ServSafe , which is recognized in all 50 states , you do not need to get a new card .
#Text=Some cities and counties require you to register your card with them , while others do not .
#Text=Check with your local municipality to see what the requirements are .
#Text=Renew your food handler ’s card every 2-5 years .
#Text=Your card ’s expiration date will depend on your location , but on average , your first food handler ’s card will be good for 3 years .
#Text=To renew , you ’ll need to take the course and test and pay the fee again .
#Text=Make sure to do this before your original card expires !
#Text=In some states , renewed cards are good for 1-2 years longer than your first card .
#Text=Determining if You Need a Card
#Text=Get your certification if you are the owner or manager .
#Text=Even if you are n’t required to have a card , you should still take the time to get your certification .
#Text=This will let you lead by example and properly educate your employees on food safety .
#Text=Ask your boss if your position requires a food handler ’s card .
#Text=Some restaurants do n’t require all employees to have a card .
#Text=Instead , they follow a rule that there must be 1 certified employee working at all open hours who can teach everyone else .
#Text=This is often the case with food truck businesses with unwrapped food or food preparation involved .
#Text=Call your city health department if you have any questions .
#Text=The rules can change depending on your city or municipality .
#Text=If you ’re not sure if the rule applies to you , call your city health department and ask .
#Text=It ’s always better to be clear on the rules than accidentally break one !
#Text=Quick Summary
